dockerfile.description: Path to the Dockerfile on the repository. Defaults to /Dockerfile

context.description: Docker context (cwd) when building the image. Defaults to .

registrySecretRefName.description: Name of the registry secret if you have a custom docker registry. Should contain CI_REGISTRY_USER, CI_REGISTRY_PASSWORD

registry.description: Url of your custom docker registry

imagePackage.description: Name of the dockerfile on the registry

imageProject.description: Optional project name in the docker registry

imageRepository.description: Optional sub repository for the docker image

target.description: Set the target build stage to build.

secrets.description: Use secrets securely at build time that will not be exposed in the image layers, keys are secrets ids, `secretName` and `secretKey` properties can be used to target the kubernetes secret

buildkitServiceClientCertsSecretName.description: Use a specific secret for build kit service client cert. default to `buildkit-client-certs`

buildkitServiceEnabled.description: Enable buildkit remote service. set to `true` to activate.

buildkitServiceAddr.description: Adress of the buildkit service. defaults to `tcp://buildkit-service.buildkit-service.svc:1234`

build-args.description: Build args to customize the docker build
